Banner.description: Join us on this transformative journey as a new era of nearshore services emerges, where your business growth and success become our top priority.

ServicesBanner.title: Your nearshore partner for growth
ServicesBanner.description: From marketing to code, our nearshore teams deliver strategies, designs, and solutions that get results.

TeamBanner.title: Meet the people driving smart, scalable success
TeamBanner.description: Behind every successful project is a team that cares. We believe in openness, collaboration, and the power of diverse perspectives. Together, we create an environment where creativity thrives, innovation leads the way, and every client feels like part of the journey.

InsightsBanner.title: Ideas that move brands forward.
InsightsBanner.description: Stay informed with the latest in marketing, design, and development.

Services.heading: Together we create.
Services.subheading: Expert app design, captivating web design, and advanced web development to elevate your digital presence and user experience.

items.title: Marketing Services
items.description: We create strategies for social media, SEO, and campaigns to grow your brand and reach more customers.

items.title: Creative Services
items.description: We design branding, UI/UX, and visual content that capture your brand's identity, tell your story, and keep your audience engaged.

items.title: Software Services
items.description: We build web, mobile, and cloud applications that are secure, scalable, and tailored to your business needs.

contact.title: Let's create your next big project together.
contact.label: Contact

ourApproach.heading: Our Approach
ourApproach.content: We combine creativity with data-driven decision making. Every engagement is tailored to your goals, whether that's building awareness, generating leads, or driving sales. By aligning strategy, content, design and performance, we make sure your message reaches the right people at the right time.

whatWeOffer.heading: What We Offer
whatWeOffer.content: A complete offering across strategy, design and delivery. From social, search and content to product design and scalable web experiences, we build systems that are secure, performant and easy to grow.

whyTrePlus.heading: Why Tre+
whyTrePlus.content: As a nearshore partner, we bring you the best of both worlds: Western-European market understanding combined with efficient delivery. Our multidisciplinary team works hand-in-hand to create solutions that are not only effective but also scalable as your business grows.

detailPage.titleSuffix: – A Bold Look for a Bold Brand

theChallenge.heading: The Challenge
theChallenge.content: When the client approached us, their goal was clear: they didn't want to look like just another brand. They wanted energy, youth, and a playful edge that would stand out both on shelves and in digital campaigns.

ourCreativeDirection.heading: Our Creative Direction
ourCreativeDirection.content: We started by rethinking their visual language, building around a bold wordmark and a vivid palette. The design is intentionally simple so the name takes center stage, while the colors carry the personality.

extendingTheBrandExperience.heading: Extending the Brand Experience
extendingTheBrandExperience.content: Beyond packaging, we created lifestyle visuals and digital campaign assets. From social media to e‑commerce banners, the look and feel stays consistent: confident, loud, and memorable.

Insights.description: Stay up to date with the latest in software development, design, and marketing. From industry news to practical tips, our insights are here to help businesses grow smarter and stay ahead.

detailPage.intro: In today's digital landscape, running ads is easy—but creating content that performs takes strategy. Here are the principles we use to design articles that inform and convert.

whatMakesItWork.heading: What Makes It Work?
whatMakesItWork.content: Clear messaging, polished visuals and timing. We combine research, strong editorial structure and performance thinking to keep readers engaged and moving forward.

whyItMatters.heading: Why It Matters
whyItMatters.content: With competition rising across channels, the right content strategy turns impressions into meaningful brand moments—and growth.

WhoWeAre.description: Tre+ was founded by three entrepreneurs, two from the Netherlands and one from Kosovo, with a vision to connect Western Europe with the talent of Eastern Europe. With expertise in development, design, and digital marketing, we created a nearshore company that blends technical skill, creativity, and cultural diversity.

OurProjects.description: We craft software, design, and marketing solutions that solve real challenges and deliver measurable impact. Each project is a collaboration that turns ideas into results our clients can rely on.
